headline: Mastercard Board of Directors Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: PURCHASE, N.Y., September 16, 2025--Mastercard announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of 76 cents per share.

raw.headline: Mastercard Board of Directors Announces Quarterly Dividend
raw.summary: PURCHASE, N.Y., September 16, 2025--Mastercard announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of 76 cents per share.

headline: American Express Expands Premium Travel With New Digital Features

headline: areeba Partners with Entrust to Become First-to-Market with Google Pay™ Enablement in Lebanon
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, September 16, 2025--Entrust, a global leader in identity-centric security solutions, today announced the expansion of its strategic partnership with areeba, a global leader in payment infrastructure. Now, areeba’s bank and fintech customers can enable Google Pay for both their Visa and Mastercard cardholders processed through its platform. This means cardholders can simply tap their Android phones or Wear OS devices to pay at any store equipped with contactless technology, noting th

Now, areeba’s bank and fintech customers can enable Google Pay for both their Visa and Mastercard cardholders processed through its platform. headline: BaseKit and Mastercard partner to boost digital inclusion for MSMEs
summary: Today, global white-label website builder and e-commerce builder BaseKit and Mastercard - announce a new partnership to help democratise tech for entrepreneurs and MSMEs around the world.

headline: AI-powered e-commerce, stablecoins and local APMs: emerging trends headline EBANX's Payments Summit in Mexico
summary: How could AI agents search, compare, and pay for things? What makes stablecoins a game-changer for cross-border digital commerce? Why are local Alternative Payment Methods (APMs) crucial for any business wanting to enter and scale in emerging markets?

headline: Welsh, Carson, Anderson & Stowe Welcomes Gene Lockhart as Operating Partner
summary: Welsh, Carson, Anderson & Stowe (WCAS), a leading private equity firm focused on the technology and healthcare industries, today announced that Gene Lockhart, former CEO and President of Mastercard and former President of the Global Retail Bank at Bank of America has joined the firm as an operating partner.

raw.headline: Welsh, Carson, Anderson & Stowe Welcomes Gene Lockhart as Operating Partner
raw.summary: Welsh, Carson, Anderson & Stowe (WCAS), a leading private equity firm focused on the technology and healthcare industries, today announced that Gene Lockhart, former CEO and President of Mastercard and former President of the Global Retail Bank at Bank of America has joined the firm as an operating partner.
